goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans

Class TauUpdate<A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans.TauUpdate<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - - The type of atom associated with the KRT that the agent in which the updates are brought about uses.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrologTauUpdate

    public abstract class TauUpdate<A>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents updates that are brought about by execution of a step, transition, or transition class.
    Author:
    sungshik

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TauUpdate.Op
      Represents the type of update that are brought about: ADD represents addition, DEL represents deletion.

    • Method Detail

      • areConflicting

        public abstract boolean areConflicting(TauUpdate<A> updateTuple)
        Determines whether these updates are not in conflict with the specified updates. A conflict arises if the same belief is both added and removed, or if the same goal is both added and removed.

      • addGoal

        public void addGoal(TauUpdate.Op op,
           LMHashSet<A> goal)
        Adds a goal to the set of added or deleted goals depending on the specified operation.
        Parameters:
        op - - The operation that is performed on the specified goal.
        goal - - The goal that is updated.

      • addBelief

        public void addBelief(TauUpdate.Op op,
             A belief)
        Adds a belief to the set of added or deleted beliefs depending on the specified operation.
        Parameters:
        op - - The operation that is performed on the specified belief.
        belief - - The belief that is updated.
